para.1: Kuti tiite fambiro mberi ipi neipi yechokwadi muupenyu hwedu hwomudzimu tinoziva kuti tinoda manyuko akavimbika ouchenjeri.
para.2: Kudzvanya pamifananidzo iri pazasi kuchakutanga iwe munzira yekuwana huchenjeri husingagumi uhwo Mwari vanoda kuti uzive nekutevera.

para.1: Nyaya iyi inotanga nenguva pasati pava nevanhu. Inobva yataura nyaya yekuti vanhu vaviri vekutanga vakadyidzana sei naMwari."
para.2: Unganidza shamwari dzako uye uverenge kuti Mwari akagadzirira sei vanhu kusvika kwaJesu neUchenjeri hwake.
para.3: Sarudza mutauro waunofarira nekudzvanya pasi rose pamusoro.

para.1: Izvi ndezvimwe zvezvinhu zvakadzidziswa naJesu nevateveri vake vepakutanga.
para.2: Vanhu vakawanda vakaona upenyu hwavo huchishandurwa sezvavakakumbira Jesu kuti avape simba rekushandisa dzidziso idzi.
para.3: Unganidza shamwari dzako uye uone zvauchawana paunenge uchikurukura mibvunzo inotevera.
para.4: Sarudza mutauro waunofarira nekudzvanya pasi rose pamusoro.

para.1: Jesu ndiye tsime reuchenjeri husingaperi. Paunenge uchiona vhidhiyo yacho, zvibvunze kuti â€œJesu akaitei uye akadzidzisei? Uchenjeri hwake hwakasiyana sei nezvakataurwa nevamwe.
para.2: Vhidhiyo iyi inowanikwa mumitauro yakawanda. Kuti uchinje mutauro tinya pasi rose pamusoro.
